images.caption:
Locality viewed from Sobotín – it is situated under the peak
Photo by P. Rozsíval

View from the locality in the direction of Červenohorské Saddleback
Photo by P. Novotný

Research on the Rauchbeerstein locality – uncovered rock outcrop
Photo by J. Král

Slag heap of rocks extracted during trial works
Photo by J. Král

Smaller samples can occasionally be found including almandine (crystal 20 mm) or staurolite
Photo by J. Král

Shale fragments with albite crystals (white up to 4 mm) and rutile (brown-red compound needle crystals of 2 mm) come from the older collections south-west of the locality
Photo by P. Novotný
